description:
Get amped for shoulder- and off-season riding. These lightweight and fully waterproof riding pants repel rain and snow to keep you riding comfortably. Breathable and stretchy fabric keeps you pedaling without feeling restricted or clammy.H2No® Performance 3-layer shell provides waterproof protection.Stretch-woven fabric for unrestricted movement.DWR-finish sheds rain and muck.Curved waistband and knees follow your body's shape in an on-bike posture.Zip fly and bike-specific OppoSet™ adjustable waist customizes the fit.Zippered leg openings can be pulled on over shoes and pads.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Dirt Roamer Storm Pants - Women's
